revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=ZTE |model=ZXDSL 831 |revision=II |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/07/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=dsl modem |fcc_id=Q78-ZXDSL831II |ic_id= |us_id=ZTEDL05BZXDSL831 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6332;BCM6332KFBG, HG1128 P12, 147977 01 W; |cpu1_cspeed=240 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=F16-100HIP |fla1_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, XJ1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=DSL (ADSL2+) Line Driver;Broadcom;BCM6301;BROADCOM, 6301KSG, TD1117P1;1; ,,, 2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;1; ,,, DC/DC Switching Regulator;ATC;AP34063;;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |stock_boot=CFE;1.0.37-10.1;BCM96338; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.8.1; |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=B0:75:D5 }} {{TagLine|ADSL CPE}} :{{ProductPage|http://wwwen.zte.com.cn/en/products/access/cpe/201405/t20140522_424133.html}} "AZ29C V1.0" is silkscreened on at least one 831II's board. ===See also=== [[ZTE ZXDSL 831CII]] ([http://remont-aud.net/dump/planshety_i_ehl_knigi/zte/zte_zxdsl831cii_chassis_pcb_bzrd0_v1_0/467-1-0-12013 Chassis PCB] - BZRD0 V1.0) 08/19/2010 *CPU: [[TrendChip]] TC3162U -LQ128G (U100) *RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM638165TS-6G (8MB) *Flash: ''Winbond'' 25Q16BVSIG (2MB) *DSL AFE: [[TrendChip]] TC3086 -QFN64-EPG (U200) *Ethernet Switch: [[TrendChip]] TC2205F (U300) *PMU: ''MPS'' MP1482DS, ATC AP34063 (DC/DC) ==Serial== ===Pinout=== .. appears to be the following... 
         XJ1
(RxD) (TxD) (GND) (3.3)

<--- to BCM6332
===Credentials=== They're the same as the HTTP admin credentials. 
Username: admin
Password: admin
